com.googlecode.gwtphonegap.client.file.browser
Class FileBrowserImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gwtphonegap.client.file.browser.FileBrowserImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
File
public class FileBrowserImpl
extends Object
implements File

Experimental this is an implementation of the phonegap file API which can be run with GWT hosted mode It simulates the api by using a remote service

Author:
Daniel Kurka
